H0.text: Who elects a new Pope. College of Bishops

H1.text: Who elects a new Pope. Vatican Council

H2.text: Who elects a new Pope. Catholic Monarchs

H3.text: Who elects a new Pope. Cardinalate

A4.text: the cardinals have nevertheless consistently elected the Bishop of Rome from among their own membership since the death of Pope Urban VI in 1389, the last non-cardinal to become pope

A5.text: It convenes on the death or resignation of a pope as a papal conclave to elect a successor. It is then restricted to eligible cardinals under the age limit of 80
